data.title: After its viral Super Bowl campaign featuring actor Michael Cera, skin care brand @CeraVe is again blurring the lines between advertising...
data.meta_description:
1,048 likes, 17 comments - adweek on April 15, 2024: "After its viral Super Bowl campaign featuring actor Michael Cera, skin care brand @CeraVe is again blurring the lines between advertising and entertainment with a movie trailer for a romantic comedy.

The trailer previews a fake film, The One Under the Sun, that has all the makings of a Netflix romcom sensation. The film, produced by agency @72andsunny_, promotes CeraVe’s Facial Moisturizing SPF 30 lotion. With its bizarre twist, it continues tactics from the brand’s successful Super Bowl campaign. 

Tapppy tap that link in bio to learn more about the campaign.".
